message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices, considering the product's value is $8,000 to you.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is too low for me. How about we settle at $9,000? This still offers you a significant saving compared to its value to you.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,750? This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you is $8,000.
